name: The Weather Thundery Canvas
text:
You can only control 1 face-up "Thunder Weathery Pattern". A "Weathery" Effect Monster(s) in the Main Monster Zone in the same column as this card, as well as in the Main Monster Zones adjacent to that zone gains this effect.
â€¢ At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can banish this card; return the opponent's monster to the hand.
